page.title: 19THE ISLE OF GRAIN
page.content: THE{ISLE OF GRAIN}IS SITUATED TO THE WEST OF THE ISLE OF{ SHEPPEY}AND LIES ON THE HOO PENINSULA.IT IS SEPARATED FROM SHEPPEY BY THE MOUTH OF THE RIVER MEDWAY. THE SECTION OF GRAIN IN OUR DOMESDAY BLOCK IS MAINLY MARSHLAND, AND IS LARGELY UNINHABITED.THERE IS THE SMALL VILLAGE OF GRAIN BUT APART FROM THAT IT THE BLOCK CONTAINS NO OTHER SETTLEMENT. THERE WAS A LARGE{OIL REFINERY}ON THE ISLE OF GRAIN BUT THIS WAS CLOSED DOWN A FEW YEARS AGO AND IS NOW BEING DEMOLISHED. SO WHAT WAS ONCE ONE OF THE BUSIEST SHIPPING LANES FOR OIL TANKERS AROUND BRITISH SHORES IS NOW EMPTY OF THESE HUGE SHIPS AND THE DOCKING FACILITIES LIE UNUSED.
